item.title: Toolkit:
item.description: using PipServices3.Expressions.Mustache;

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description: import { MustacheTemplate } from "pip-services3-expressions-nodex";

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description: from pip_services3_expressions.mustache.MustacheTemplate import MustacheTemplate

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
import 'package:pip_services3_expressions/pip_services3_expressions.dart';

void main(List<String> arguments) {
  // variable
  var template = MustacheTemplate();
  template.template = 'Hello, {{{NAME}}}';
  var variables = {'NAME': 'Alex'};

  var result = template.evaluateWithVariables(variables);
  print(result);
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	mustache "github.com/pip-services3-go/pip-services3-expressions-go/mustache"
)

func main() {
	// variable
	template := mustache.NewMustacheTemplate()
	template.SetTemplate("Hello, {{{NAME}}}")
	variables := map[string]string{
		"NAME": "Alex",
	}

	result, _ := template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables)

	fmt.Println(result)
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
using PipServices3.Expressions.Mustache;

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace ExampleApp
{

    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            // variable
            var template = new MustacheTemplate();
            template.Template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}";
            var variables = new Dictionary<string, dynamic>{
                { "NAME", "Alex" },
            };
   
            var result = template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables);
            Console.WriteLine(result);
        }
    }
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
import { MustacheTemplate } from "pip-services3-expressions-nodex";


export function main() {
    // variable
    let template = new MustacheTemplate();
    template.template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}";
    let variables = { "NAME": "Alex" };

    let result = template.evaluateWithVariables(variables);
    console.log(result);
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
# variable
template = MustacheTemplate()
template.template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}"
variables = {
    'NAME': 'Alex',
}

result = template.evaluate_with_variables(variables)
print(result)

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
import 'package:pip_services3_expressions/pip_services3_expressions.dart';

void main(List<String> arguments) {
  // variable
  var template = MustacheTemplate();
  template.template = 'Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}';
  var variables = {'NAME': 'Alex', 'EXCLAMATION': '1'};

  var result = template.evaluateWithVariables(variables);
  print(result);
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	mustache "github.com/pip-services3-go/pip-services3-expressions-go/mustache"
)

func main() {
	// conditional construction
	template := mustache.NewMustacheTemplate()
	template.SetTemplate("Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}")
	variables := map[string]string{
		"NAME":        "Alex",
		"EXCLAMATION": "1",
	}

	result, _ := template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables)

	fmt.Println(result)
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
using PipServices3.Expressions.Mustache;

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace ExampleApp
{

    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            // variable
            var template = new MustacheTemplate();
            template.Template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}";
            var variables = new Dictionary<string, dynamic>{
                { "NAME", "Alex" },
                {"EXCLAMATION", "1" }
            };
   
            var result = template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables);
            Console.WriteLine(result);
        }
    }
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
import { MustacheTemplate } from "pip-services3-expressions-nodex";


export function main() {
    // variable
    let template = new MustacheTemplate();
    template.template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}";
    let variables = { "NAME": "Alex" , "EXCLAMATION": "1" };

    let result = template.evaluateWithVariables(variables);
    console.log(result);
}

item.description:
import 'package:pip_services3_expressions/pip_services3_expressions.dart';

void main(List<String> arguments) {
  // variable
  var template = MustacheTemplate();
  template.template = 'Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}';
  var variables = {'NAME': 'Alex', 'EXCLAMATION': false};

  var result = template.evaluateWithVariables(variables);
  print(result);
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	mustache "github.com/pip-services3-go/pip-services3-expressions-go/mustache"
)

func main() {
	// conditional construction
	template := mustache.NewMustacheTemplate()
	template.SetTemplate("Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}")
	variables := map[string]string{
		"NAME":        "Alex",
		"EXCLAMATION": "",
	}

	result, _ := template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables)

	fmt.Println(result)
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
using PipServices3.Expressions.Mustache;

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace ExampleApp
{

    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            // variable
            var template = new MustacheTemplate();
            template.Template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}";
            var variables = new Dictionary<string, dynamic>{
                { "NAME", "Alex" },
                {"EXCLAMATION", false }
            };
   
            var result = template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables);
            Console.WriteLine(result);
        }
    }
}

import { MustacheTemplate } from "pip-services3-expressions-nodex";


export function main() {
    // variable
    let template = new MustacheTemplate();
    template.template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}";

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
# conditional construction
template = MustacheTemplate()
template.template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}"
variables = {
    'NAME': 'Alex',

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
import 'package:pip_services3_expressions/pip_services3_expressions.dart';

void main(List<String> arguments) {
  // "if else" construction
  var template = MustacheTemplate();
  template.template =
      'Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}{{{^EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/EXCLAMATION}}}';
  var variables = {'NAME': 'Alex', 'EXCLAMATION': false};

  var result = template.evaluateWithVariables(variables);
  print(result);
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	mustache "github.com/pip-services3-go/pip-services3-expressions-go/mustache"
)

func main() {
	// "if else" construction
	template := mustache.NewMustacheTemplate()
	template.SetTemplate("Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}{{{^EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/EXCLAMATION}}}")
	variables := map[string]string{
		"NAME":        "Alex",
		"EXCLAMATION": "",
	}

	result, _ := template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables)

	fmt.Println(result)
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
using PipServices3.Expressions.Mustache;

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace ExampleApp
{

    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            // "if else" construction
            var template = new MustacheTemplate();
            template.Template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}{{{^EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/EXCLAMATION}}}";
            var variables = new Dictionary<string, dynamic>{
                { "NAME", "Alex" },
                {"EXCLAMATION", false }
            };
   
            var result = template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables);
            Console.WriteLine(result);
        }
    }
}

import 'package:pip_services3_expressions/pip_services3_expressions.dart';

void main(List<String> arguments) {
  // "if else" construction
  var template = MustacheTemplate();
  template.template =
      'Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}{{{^EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/EXCLAMATION}}}';
  var variables = {'NAME': 'Alex', 'EXCLAMATION': '1'};

  var result = template.evaluateWithVariables(variables);

}

package main

import (
	"fmt"

	mustache "github.com/pip-services3-go/pip-services3-expressions-go/mustache"
)

func main() {
	// "if else" construction
	template := mustache.NewMustacheTemplate()
	template.SetTemplate("Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}{{{^EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/EXCLAMATION}}}")
	variables := map[string]string{
		"NAME":        "Alex",
		"EXCLAMATION": "1",

	result, _ := template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables)

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
using PipServices3.Expressions.Mustache;

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace ExampleApp
{

    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            // "if else" construction
            var template = new MustacheTemplate();
            template.Template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}{{{^EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/EXCLAMATION}}}";
            var variables = new Dictionary<string, dynamic>{
                { "NAME", "Alex" },
                {"EXCLAMATION", "1" }
            };
   
            var result = template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables);
            Console.WriteLine(result);
        }
    }
}

import { MustacheTemplate } from "pip-services3-expressions-nodex";


export function main() {
    // "if else" construction
    let template = new MustacheTemplate();
    template.template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}{{{^EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/EXCLAMATION}}}";

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
# "if else" construction
template = MustacheTemplate()
template.template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{ #if EXCLAMATION }}!{{/if}}{{{^EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/EXCLAMATION}}}"
variables = {
    'NAME': 'Alex',
    'EXCLAMATION': True
}

result = template.evaluate_with_variables(variables)
print(result)

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
import 'package:pip_services3_expressions/pip_services3_expressions.dart';

void main(List<String> arguments) {
  // equivalent constructions
  var template = MustacheTemplate();
  template.template =
      'Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{{#unless EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/unless}}}';
  var variables = {'NAME': 'Alex', 'EXCLAMATION': '1'};

  var result = template.evaluateWithVariables(variables);
  print(result);
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	mustache "github.com/pip-services3-go/pip-services3-expressions-go/mustache"
)

func main() {
	// equivalent constructions
	template := mustache.NewMustacheTemplate()
	template.SetTemplate("Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{{#unless EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/unless}}}")
	variables := map[string]string{
		"NAME":        "Alex",
		"EXCLAMATION": "1",
	}

	result, _ := template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables)

	fmt.Println(result)
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
using PipServices3.Expressions.Mustache;

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace ExampleApp
{

    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            // equivalent constructions
            var template = new MustacheTemplate();
            template.Template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{{#unless EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/unless}}}";
            var variables = new Dictionary<string, dynamic>{
                { "NAME", "Alex" },
                {"EXCLAMATION", "1" }
            };
   
            var result = template.EvaluateWithVariables(variables);
            Console.WriteLine(result);
        }
    }
}

item.description:
import { MustacheTemplate } from "pip-services3-expressions-nodex";


export function main() {
    // equivalent constructions
    let template = new MustacheTemplate();
    template.template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{{#unless EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/unless}}}";
    let variables = { "NAME": "Alex" , "EXCLAMATION": "1" };

    let result = template.evaluateWithVariables(variables);
    console.log(result);
}

item.title: Toolkit:
item.description:
# equivalent constructions
template = MustacheTemplate()
template.template = "Hello, {{{NAME}}}{{{#unless EXCLAMATION}}}.{{{/unless}}}"
variables = {
    'NAME': 'Alex',
    'EXCLAMATION': True    
}

result = template.evaluate_with_variables(variables)
print(result)
